attributes.action: URGENT-Land Windsor Road needs 'PUBLIC OPEN SPACE'status protecting-please sign!
attributes.additional_details: 45 years of restricted use, LET'S FIGHT FOR UN-RESTRICTED USE of Protected Open Space. Used for enjoying walks, wildlife, dog walking, football club, cricket club,angling club, horse riding, stables, grazing land, aids health and well-being of the Community, crucial in facilitating recreational and sports activities proven to help the lives of people of all ages.
attributes.background: The petition is to prove the Community want continued use of their 'Public Open Space'. If you use the land for the football,cricket,fishing,stables/grazing/horse-riding,or just for pleasure-enjoying wildlife/walking the dog-PLEASE SIGN.We need to prove this land is used,otherwise we risk losing it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
